title: ConfigUpdateProjectArgs
description: Schema for config_update_project tool arguments. Updates a project's configuration with optional migration of memories to a new location.

code_path.description: New code path for the project. Use ~ for home directory.

memories_path.description: New memories path. Use 'DEFAULT', 'CODE', or an absolute path.

migrate.description: Whether to migrate memories to new location if path changes. Default: true.
